actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: A bill to deny farm program benefits to agricultural producers who participate in the illegal production of cannabis or other prohibited drug-producing plants on their farms.
short_title: Denial of Programs Eligibility Act of 1985

summary.text: Denial of Programs Eligibility Act of 1985 - Denies farm program benefits to agricultural producers who participate in the illegal production of cannabis (marihuana) or other prohibited drug-producing plants on their farms.

titles.title: Denial of Programs Eligibility Act of 1985
A bill to deny farm program benefits to agricultural producers who participate in the illegal production of cannabis or other prohibited drug-producing plants on their farms.
